scenarios.name: Direct Cost Question
scenarios.expectedBehavior: Range ($3k-$7k), mention insurance, payment plans, consultation for exact quote

scenarios.name: Insurance Verification
questions: I have Delta Dental insurance. Will you accept it?
scenarios.expectedBehavior: Yes, we accept Delta, typical coverage 50-85%, offer to verify benefits

scenarios.name: Payment Plan Inquiry
questions: Do you offer payment plans? I can't pay everything upfront.
scenarios.expectedBehavior: Yes, flexible payment plans, 0% financing, CareCredit

scenarios.name: Invisalign Cost
questions: How much more expensive is Invisalign compared to braces?
scenarios.expectedBehavior: Invisalign typically $4k-$8k, similar to ceramic braces

scenarios.name: Family Discount
questions: I have three kids who need braces. Do you give family discounts?
scenarios.expectedBehavior: Yes, family discounts available, explain percentage savings

scenarios.name: Upfront Payment Discount
questions: If I pay everything upfront, do you give a discount?

scenarios.name: FSA/HSA Question
questions: Can I use my FSA account to pay for braces?
scenarios.expectedBehavior: Yes, orthodontics eligible for FSA/HSA reimbursement

scenarios.name: CareCredit Inquiry
scenarios.expectedBehavior: Yes, CareCredit accepted, mention promotional financing
